Thickness of different retinal layers in WT (white bars) and 3×Tg-AD (black bars) mice at 4, 8, 12, and 16 months of age, based on in vivo
OCT line scans. The thickness of retinal layers was measured using the InSight software.
The results are presented as mean ± SEM. *
